card.name: Captain Phasma
card.effect: Your non-unique characters have the Guardian keyword
card.quote: "Whatever you're planning, it won't work."

card.name: First Order Stormtrooper
card.quote: Members of this new generation of stormtroopers are trained from birth and fed a steady diet of First Order propaganda to ensure absolute loyalty.

card.name: General Grevious
card.effect: Before an opponent's character is defeated, you may move one of their non-ability upgrades to this character

card.name: General Veers
card.action: Remove this die to turn one of your support die to any side
card.qoute: "General, prepare your troops for a surface attack." - Dart Vader

card.name: AT-ST
card.specialEffect: Discard a support from play
card.quote: The All Terrain Scout Transport filled both support and reconnaissance roles in the Galactic Empire's war machine.

card.name: First Order TIE Fighter
card.specialEffect: Remove all shields from all of an opponent's characters

card.name: Commanding Presence
card.specialEffect: Choose a Red die. If it is your die, resolve it, increasing its value by 2. If it is an opponent's die, remove it.

card.name: F-11D Rifle
card.specialEffect: Force an opponent to deal 2 damage to their characters, distributing the damage as they wish.

card.name: Count Dooku
card.effect: Before this character is dealt 1 or more damage, you may discard a card from your hand to give him 1 shield.

card.name: Darth Vader
card.effect: After you activate this character, you may force an opponent to choose and discard a card from their hand.
card.quote: "If you will not fight, then you will meet your destiny."

card.name: Kylo Ren
card.specialEffect: Choose an opponent's character, then look at a random card in that opponent's hand. Deal damage to the selected character equal to the cost of the card you just looked at.

card.name: Nightsister
card.action: Reroll a die. Deal 1 damage to this character.
card.quote: Nightsisters are skilled at twisting the force to their own ends.

card.name: Force Choke
card.specialEffect: Deal 1 unblockable damage to another character. Then you may turn one of its character or upgrade dice to any side.

card.name: Immobilize
card.action: Remove this die to turn a die to a side showing a blank (-).

card.name: Kylo Ren's Lightsaber
card.specialEffect: Deal 2 damage to a character. If any of this damage is blocked by shields, reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.

card.name: Sith holocron
card.specialEffect: Switch this upgrade with a blue effect upgrade in your hand, ignoring its play restrictions. Then you may spend 1 resource to roll its die into your pool, if able.

card.name: Infantry grenades
card.specialEffect: Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters. Discard this upgrade from play.

card.name: Speeder bike scout
card.specialEffect: Remove a die. You may take one additional action.

card.name: Bala-Tik
card.effect: After an opponent's character is defeated, you may ready this character.

card.name: Jabba the Hutt
card.effect: After you activate this character, you may reroll a yellow die.
card.quote: "I shall enjoy watching you die."

card.name: Jango Fett
card.effect: After an opponent activates a character, you may activate this character.
card.quote: "There can be no mistakes this time."

card.name: Tusken Raider
card.effect: After you activate this character, you may discar a card from your hand to resolve one of its character or upgrade dice.

card.name: Crime Lord
card.specialEffect: Spend 5 resources to choose a character. That character is defeated after this round ends.

card.name: Flame Thrower
card.specialEffect: Deal 1 damage each to up to 3 different characters.

card.name: Gaffi stick
card.specialEffect: Remove one of your dice showing melee damage to deal 3 damage to a character.

card.name: On the hunt
card.specialEffect: Remove all shields from a character. You may spend 1 resource to remove one of it's character or upgrade dice.

card.name: Admiral Ackbar
card.effect: After an opponent plays or discards the last card from their hand, they choose and deal 2 damage to one of their characters.

card.name: Leia Organa
card.action: Remove this die to reroll up to two of your dice.
card.quote: "Someone has to save our skins."

card.name: Poe Dameron
card.specialEffect: Discard a card from your hand to resolve one of its die, if able. THen, if it was a vehicle card, you may pay its cost to play it from your discard pile.

card.name: Rebel Trooper
card.effect: Guardian. (Before you activate this character, you may resolve an opponent's dice showing damage against it.)

card.name: Launch Bay
card.effect: The X on this die is equal to the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Black One
card.specialEffect: Deal 1 damage to a character. Reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.
card.quote: Poe Dameron's X-Wing was modified to be even more versatile than the standard T-70.

card.name: Scout
card.specialEffect: Look at an opponent's hand and discard the cheapest card from it (you choose in the case of a tie).

card.name: Survival Gear
card.quote: To hide from the Empire, the rebels must often brave harsh environments.

card.name: Luke Skywalker
card.effect: After you activate this character, draw a card.
card.quote: "I am a jedi, like my father before me."

card.name: Padawan
card.effect: While this character does not have an upgrade, the cost to attach a weapon to it is decreased by 1.

card.name: Qui-Gon Jinn
card.effect: Before this character gains 1 or more shields, you may remove 1 of his shields to deal 1 damage to a character.
card.quote: "Your focus determines your reality."

card.name: Rey
card.effect: After you play an upgrade on this character, you may take one additional action.
card.quote: "I think I can handle myself."

card.name: Force protection
card.specialEffect: Give 3 shields to your characters, distributed as you wish.

card.name: Jedi robes
card.effect: After you play this upgrade, give attached character one shield, or 2 shields instead if it is the first turn of the game.

card.name: Luke Skywalker's Lightsaber
card.specialEffect: Give a character 2 shields or deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.

card.name: One With The Force
card.effect: Before attached character is defeated, this upgrade becomes a support for the rest of the game (it starts ready).

card.name: BB-8
card.specialEffect: Reroll this die and one of your other dice. Do not remove this die from your pool after resolving this effect.
card.quote: "Orange and white, one of a kind." - Poe Dameron

card.name: Rey's staff
card.specialEffect: Remove a die showing damage (melee or ranged).

card.name: Finn
card.effect: You can attach any weapon to this character, ignoring play restrictions. \n You can include Red Villain weapons and vehicles in your deck.
card.quote: "I am not going back."

card.name: Han Solo
card.effect: After you play a card with the Ambush keyword, you may give this character 1 shield.
card.quote: "You know, sometimes I amaze even myself."

card.name: Hired Gun
card.quote: "You needn't worry about your reward. If money is all that you love, then that's what you'll receive." - Leia Organa

card.name: Padme Amidala
card.specialEffect: Discard the top card of an opponent's deck or spend 1 resource to discard the top 2 cards of an opponent's deck.
card.quote: "My fate will be no different to that of our people."

card.name: Millennium Falcon
card.specialEffect: Play a Yellow event from your discard pile or hand for free.
card.quote: "She may not look like much, but she's got it where it counts." - Han Solo

card.name: Diplomatic Immunity
card.effect: The shields from this die can be given to any of your characters distributed as you wish.

card.name: DL-44 Heavy Blaster Pistol
card.effect: After you play this upgrade, force an opponent to choose and remove one of their dice.

card.name: Infiltrate
card.specialEffect: Reroll up to 2 of an opponent's dice.

card.name: Outpost
card.specialEffect: Resolve the battlefield ability as if you had just claimed it.

card.name: DH-17 Blaster Pistol
card.quote: The weapon of choice for rebel soldiers and imperial officers alike during the Galactic Civil War.

card.name: IQA-11 Blaster Rifle
card.specialEffect: Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.

card.name: Promotion
card.effect: After you play this upgrade, you may draw a card.

card.name: Force throw
card.specialEffect: Remove a die to deal a character damage equal to the value showing on that die (specials and blanks are zeroes).

card.name: Force training
card.specialEffect: Choose and do two of the following: deal 1 damage to a character, or gain 1 resource, or give a character 1 shield.

card.name: Lightsaber
card.specialEffect: Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
card.quote: "An elegant weapon for a more civilized age." - Obi-Wan Kenobi

card.name: Mind probe
card.specialEffect: Deal an opponent's character one damage for each card in that opponent's hand.

card.name: Comlink
card.effect: After you play this upgrade you may reroll any number of your dice or any number of an opponent's dice.

card.name: Datapad
card.effect: After you play this upgrade you may reroll any number of your dice or any number of an opponent's dice.
card.specialEffect: Turn one of your dice to a side not showing damage (melee or ranged).

card.name: Black Market
card.specialEffect: Draw 2 cards. You may play an upgrade from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.

card.name: Cunning
card.specialEffect: Resolve a special ability on another card in play as if it were your card.

card.name: Jetpack
card.specialEffect: Remove a die showing melee damage and give attached character a shield.

card.name: Thermal Detonator
card.restriction: To play, spot a yellow character.
card.specialEffect: Deal 3 damage to each of an opponent's characters. Discard this upgrade from play.

card.name: Cannon Fodder
card.effect: Deal one of your non-unique characters damage equal to the value of an opponent's die showing damage (melee or ranged). Then remove that die.

card.name: Closing The Net
card.effect: Force an opponent to choose and remove one of their dice. You may place this event on the bottom of your deck instead of discarding it.

card.name: Endless ranks
card.effect: Return one of your defeated non-unique red characters to the game with no damage on it.
card.quote: Battle droids are less effective than flesh and blood soldiers, but they are also much cheaper to replace.

card.name: Occupation
card.restriction: Play only if you control the battlefield.
card.effect: Force an opponent to lose all their resources.

card.name: Probe
card.effect: Look at two random cards from your opponent's hand and discard any of these cards that are events.

card.name: Sweep the Area
card.effect: Count the number of ready Red characters you have. Reroll that many of an opponent's dice.

card.name: Tactical mastery
card.effect: Spot a red character to take up to 2 additional actions.

card.name: The best defense
card.effect: Deal one of your red characters 3 damage to remove up to 2 of an opponent's dice.
card.quote: "There they are! Blast them!"

card.name: Drudge Work
card.action: Exhaust this support and one of your characters to gain 1 resource.

card.name: Local Garrison
card.effect: Each opponent gains 1 fewer resource during each upkeep phase to a minimum of 1.

card.name: Personal Escort
card.effect: Attached character has the Guardian keyword.

card.name: Abandon all hope
card.effect: Force an opponent to choose to eother lose all of their resources or discard all cards in their hand.

card.name: Boundless ambition
card.effect: Draw cards up to your hand size.

card.name: Enrage
card.effect: Deal 1 damage to one of your Blue characters to gain one resource.

card.name: Intimidate
card.effect: Remove all shields from a character.

card.name: Force Strike
card.effect: Turn one of your Blue dice to the side showing melee damage. Then you may resolve that die.

card.name: Intimidate
card.effect: Remove all shields from a character.

card.name: Isolation
card.effect: Spot a blue character to remove a character die.

card.name: No Mercy
card.effect: Discard any number of Blue cards from your hand. Then resolve one of your dice showing damage (melee or ranged), increasing its value by 1 for each card you just discarded.

card.name: Pulling the Strings
card.effect: DLook at the top 3 cards of any deck. Then place those cards on the top and/or bottom of that deck in any order.

card.name: Emperor's Favor
card.effect: Your hand size is increased by 1.

card.name: Power of the dark side
card.action: Exhaust this support to reroll one of your dice. If that die rolls a blank, deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
card.quote: "If you only knew the power of the dark side." - Darth Vader

card.name: Hidden in Shadow
card.action: If attached character has no shields, exhaust this upgrade to give it 1 shield.

card.name: Nowhere to Run
card.effect: Turn each of your dice showing a blank to any side.

card.name: Ace in the Hole
card.effect: Discard a Yellow upgrade from your hand to roll its die into your pool, if able. Set aside that die after it is resolved or removed.

card.name: Armed to the Teeth
card.effect: Discard any number of upgrades from one of your Yellow characters. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of upgrades you just discarded.

card.name: Confiscation
card.effect: Spend resources equal to the cost of an opponent's upgrade in play to return that upgrade to their hand.

card.name: Fight Dirty
card.effect: Remove any number of your Yellow dice. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of dice you just removed.

card.name: Go for the kill
card.effect: Resolve one of your dice showing ranged damage, treating this damage as unblockable.

card.name: He Doesn't Like You
card.effect: Remove one of your dice to remove an opponent's die.
card.quote: "I don't like you, either."

card.name: Lying in Wait
card.effect: Force an opponent to choose and discard cards from their hand down to the number of cards you have in your hand.

card.name: Backup Muscle
card.effect: When you play this support, place 3 damage on it.
card.action: Exhaust this support to move 1 damage from it to a character (this ignores shields).

card.name: My Kind of Scum
card.effect: After you resolve a die showing disrupt, you may exhaust this support to gain resources equal to the number of resources your opponents just lost.

card.name: Underworld Connections
card.action: Exhaust this support to gain 1 resource.

card.name: Prized Possession
card.effect: After you play this upgrade, you may remove an opponent's character die and place it here. It is not rolled by any character and does not return to its character unless this upgrade leaves play.

card.name: Commando raid
card.effect: Resolve one of your red dice showing discard, increasing its value by 2. Then draw a card.

card.name: Defensive position
card.restriction: Play only if you control the battlefield
card.effect: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing a value of 2 or higher.

card.name: Field Medic
card.effect: Remove 2 damage from a character.

card.name: Hit and run
card.restriction: Play only if you control the battlefield
card.effect: Activate one of your red characters.

card.name: It's a Trap!
card.effect: Choose a symbol showing on an opponent's die. Then turn any number of your Red dice to sides showing that symbol.

card.name: Natural Talent
card.effect: Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1.

card.name: Rearm
card.effect: Play a Red upgrade from your discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1

card.name: Retreat
card.effect: Your opponent may take 1 action. Then end the action phase.

card.name: Strategic Planning
card.effect: Ready or exhaust a support.

card.name: Surgical Strike
card.effect: Remove any number of your Red dice showing ranged damage, increasing each of their values by 1, to discard a support from play that costs equal to or less than the combined value of those dice.

card.name: Resistance HQ
card.action: Exhaust this support and discard a card from your hand to give a character 1 shield. Then ready this support unless an opponent spends 1 resource.

card.name: Anticipate
card.effect: Force an opponent to choose and resolve any number of their dice in the order of their choice. Then remove all of their dice they did not resolve.

card.name: Defensive stance
card.effect: Give a character 2 shields.

card.name: Force misdirection
card.effect: Choose a symbol showing on one of your blue dice. Then remove all of an opponent's dice showing that symbol.

card.name: Heroism
card.effect: Deal one of your unique characters damage equal to the value of an opponent's die showing damage (ranged or melee). Then remove that die.

card.name: Noble Sacrifice
card.effect: Defeat one of your Blue characters to exhaust a character.

card.name: Patience
card.effect: Remove any number of your dice. Then discard cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of dice you just removed.

card.name: Return of the Jedi
card.effect: Add a blue event from your discard pile to your hand.
card.quote: "Pass on what you have learned." - Yoda

card.name: Riposte
card.effect: Remove any number of shields from one of your characters. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of shields you just removed.

card.name: Willpower
card.effect: Move 1 damage from one of your exhausted characters to an opponent's exhausted character (this ignores shields).

card.name: Jedi Council
card.action: Exhaust this support to look at the top 2 cards of a player's deck. Then you may discard one of those cards and have that player draw the other.

card.name: Awakening
card.action: Exhaust this support to resolve one of your dice showing a modified side (a side with a +) as if it was not modified (did not have the +).

card.name: The Force is Strong
card.action: Exhaust this support and discard a Blue card from your hand to play another copy of that card from your hand for free.

card.name: Daring escape
card.effect: Reroll any number of an opponent's dice. Then remove all of their dice showing blanks.

card.name: Don't get cocky
card.effect: Each player draws 2 cards.
card.quote: "I got one! I got one!" - Luke Skywalker

card.name: Draw attention
card.effect: Move up to 2 damage from one of your characters to another one of your characters (this ignores shields).

card.name: Hyperspace jump
card.effect: End the action phase. You may switch the battlefield with the battlefield that is not being used.

card.name: Let The Wookie Win
card.effect: Force an opponent to either deal one of their exhausted characters 2 damage or chose and remove 2 of their dice.

card.name: Negotiate
card.effect: Remove one of your character dice to force an opponent to choose and remove 2 of their dice.

card.name: Scavenge
card.effect: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Then you may add an upgrade or support from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Shoot First
card.effect: Resolve one of your Yellow dice showing ranged damage. Then remove an opponent's die showing ranged damage.

card.name: Smuggling
card.effect: Spot a Yellow character and discard a card from your hand to gain 1 resource.

card.name: Play the Odds
card.action: Exhaust this support to reroll one of your Yellow dice. If it rolls a resource, gain 1 resource.

card.name: Street Informants
card.action: Exhaust this support to look at an opponent's hand.

card.name: Second Chance
card.effect: Before attached character would be defeated, instead heal 5 damage from it and discard this upgrade from play.

card.name: Award Ceremony
card.effect: Spot a Red character to draw cards equal to the number of exhausted characters you have.

card.name: Dug In
card.restriction: Play only if you control the battlefield.
card.effect: Give 3 shields to your characters, distributed as you wish.

card.name: Firepower
card.effect: Resolve one of your Red dice showing ranged damage, increasing its value by 1, or by 2 instead if you are resolving a vehicle die.

card.name: Leadership
card.effect: Exhaust one of your unique Red characters to ready another character.

card.name: Logistics
card.effect: Spot a red character to resolve a die with the resource symbol, increasing its value by 1.

card.name: Squad tactics
card.effect: Activate any number of your non-unique characters at once.

card.name: Supporting Fire
card.action: Exhaust this support to resolve one of your dice showing ranged damage, increasing its value by 1.

card.name: Deflect
card.effect: Spot a Blue character to remove a die showing ranged damage and deal half of that damage, rounded up, to a character.

card.name: Disturbance in the force
card.effect: Reroll all dice
card.quote: "I fear something terrible has happened, as if millions of voices suddenly cried out and were silenced." - Obi-Wan Kenobi

card.name: Mind trick
card.effect: Spot a blue character to force an opponent to split their dice pool into 2 groups of any sice. Choose one group and remove all dice in it.

card.name: The Power of the Force
card.effect: Resolve one of your dice, treating its value as equal to the number of Blue upgrades you have in play.

card.name: Use the Force
card.effect: Spot a blue character to turn a die to any side.
card.quote: "The force will be with you, always." - Obi-Wan Kenobi

card.name: It Binds All Things
card.effect: Before you play a Blue upgrade, you may exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.

card.name: Aim
card.effect: Turn one of your dice to a side showing ranged damage.

card.name: All In
card.effect: Resolve any number of your dice in the order of your choice.

card.name: Block
card.effect: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing melee damage.

card.name: Close Quarters Assault
card.effect: Count the number of dice you have showing melee damage. Discard that many random cards from an opponent's hand.

card.name: Dodge
card.effect: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing ranged damage.

card.name: Flank
card.restriction: Play only if you have more ready characters than an opponent.
card.effect: Remove one of that opponent's dice.

card.name: Take Cover
card.effect: Give a character 1 shield.

card.name: Disarm
card.effect: Remove one of your dice showing damage (ranged or melee) to discard a weapon or equipment from play that costs equal to or less than the value of that die.

card.name: Electroshock
card.effect: Spot a Yellow character to remove a die showing a value of 2 or lower.

card.name: Reversal
card.effect: Spot a Yellow character to remove a die showing damage (ranged or melee) and deal that damage to a character.

card.name: Scramble
card.effect: Spot a Yellow character to reroll all of an opponent's dice.

card.name: Unpredictable
card.effect: Reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).

card.name: Infamous
card.effect: Before you play a Yellow card, you may exhaust this support to give it the Ambush keyword.

card.name: Hunker Down
card.action: Exhaust this upgrade to give attached character 1 shield.
card.effect: If attached character takes melee damage (), discard this upgrade.

card.name: Command Center
card.claim: Each opponent discards the top 2 cards of their deck.

card.name: Echo base
card.claim: Each opponent discards the top 2 cards of their deck.

card.name: Emperor's Throne Room
card.claim: Turn one of your dice to a side showing a special ability. Then you may resolve that die.

card.name: Imperial armory
card.claim: Play an upgrade from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.

card.name: Jedi Temple
card.claim: Look at an opponent's hand and discard up to 2 events of your choice from it.

card.name: Rebel War Room
card.claim: Resolve one of your dice. If it has a resource cost, you do not have to pay it.

card.name: Mos Eisley Spaceport
card.claim: Return one of your upgrades in play to your hand to gain 1 resource.

card.name: Separatist base
card.claim: Each opponent chooses and deals 1 unblockable damage to one of their characters.

card.name: Starship graveyard
card.claim: Choose a support or upgrade in your discard pile and place it on top of your deck.
